\subsection{Detailed Description}
Class for doing certain utility functions (basically things that cannot be logically organized into the other framework classes) 

\subsection{Member Function Documentation}

\hypertarget{class_utils_a16570f6fb09cfe74540f7161e8707e6a}{\index{Utils@{Utils}!bool\-\_\-unset@{bool\-\_\-unset}}
\index{bool\-\_\-unset@{bool\-\_\-unset}!Utils@{Utils}}
\subsubsection[{bool\-\_\-unset}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}static bool\-\_\-unset (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{\$var}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [static]}}}\label{class_utils_a16570f6fb09cfe74540f7161e8707e6a}
simple boolean replacement for P\-H\-P's native unset since 'unset' is a construct and not a function, it has no return value, so there's no way of knowing if the item was unset or not. (More specifically whether it existed to be unset in the first place)
